title: punnakaippadu nIyO
sahitya:
punnakaippadu nIyO andap-poruL enakkOdAyO


anupallavi

  tanmaya orumaiyaip-panmaiyAi viLakkiya tantirak-kOlam koL indrajAlanE


caraNam    sUriya candrararil vAna shuDarmaNip-pandigaLil nAriyar nANattilE 
Ashai nalgu kaN kONatilE Ariya minnalilE pUvin azhagAna pinnalilE
vaTTa ulagengum eTTi eTTip-pArttu vAyait-tirakkAdu mAyam shei IsahanE
